resources.string:
OPTIONS MENU:
In the options menu you can find several additional features of this app, e.g. changing the preferences or adding new contacts to your list of birthdays.

LONG-PRESSING A CONTACT:
When you long-press a contact in your list of birthdays, a menu with options will pop up where you can choose to edit or delete an existing entry in your list of birthdays.

ADDING A PHOTO:
You can only add photos for people who are not in your contacts but manually added to this application. For people from your contacts list, please edit the entry in your Android contacts.

WIDGET:
Go to your homescreen and hit "Add", then "Widget" to add the upcoming birthdays to your homescreen. Your widget will be refreshed every 6 hours!

1970 PROBLEM:
If you cannot enter dates prior to 1970, it's a common problem for your device (often with Motorola devices). Please go to the app's settings and disable the "Easy date selection". After that change, you'll have to enter dates in a text field - but you can at least enter dates prior to 1970.

NO NOTIFICATIONS:
The latest versions of Android (4.0+) offer special settings for notifications. For example, you can switch off all notifications in the status bar (where 3G, Wi-Fi, GPS and Bluetooth are located) or disable notifications in "Manage apps" among your settings. Please check these settings if your notifications don't work.

MOVING TO EXTERNAL STORAGE:
You cannot move this app to the external storage (SD card) as notifications for upcoming birthdays wouldn't work in that case. Sorry!

SUPPORTED DATE FORMATS:
We fully support date formats according to ISO 8601, that is YYYY-MM-DD. For other formats, we cannot guarantee that they are read correctly.

CAN I HELP TRANSLATING THE APP?
Yes, you can. Just use our application on Facebook, where you can easily edit all translations and improve them for all users. Please open the following link on a desktop computer for better reading and editing:
http://birthdays.latein.me/

This feature requires \"Birthdays Plus\", an extended but still free version of this app. It uses additional permissions (access to internet and SD card) to offer you better features. Just visit Google Play to get the extended app and enjoy great features. Try it - it\'s free!

A convenient way of date selection that lets you pick day, month and year from a list.
A simple text field will be shown. You can type the date manually. This is useful if your device does not accept years prior to 1970 otherwise.
